all, I was tranlating this mei and nengo for someone on my board

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/16.jpg

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/15.jpg

I believe the mei reads Bumi Ju Kunimasa. I am unable to confirm the first two characters but thought it referred to an Edo smith that also signed Bushu Edo. The date I read as 8th month of the 6th year of Ansei 1854 so..August 1859. 

thoughts ?

cheers

Rich
